head.description: This file contains natural language, web and SPARQL query patterns for querying a hybrid data sources.

patterns.en_query_pattern: Give me websites about every book whose author is [author]
patterns.hybrid_query_pattern:
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/>
PREFIX md: <http://mekano.org/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?book ?webAbout

WHERE {

?book a dbo:Book .
        ?book dbo:author [author] .
?webAbout md:containsThing ?book .
        ?webAbout md:containsWord "purchase" .

}
ORDER BY ASC(?book)
LIMIT 10

patterns.en_query_pattern: Give me the availability of every book whose author is [author]
patterns.hybrid_query_pattern:
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/>
PREFIX md: <http://mekano.org/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?book ?web ?offer ?availability

WHERE {

?book a dbo:Book .
        ?book dbo:author [author] .
?web md:containsThing ?book .
        ?web md:containsWord "purchase" .
        ?web md:hasMicrodata ?microdata .
        ?microdata schema:offers ?offer .
        ?microdata schema:availability ?availability .

}
ORDER BY ASC(?book)
LIMIT 10

patterns.en_query_pattern: Give me the description of every book whose author is [author]
patterns.hybrid_query_pattern:
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/>
PREFIX md: <http://mekano.org/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?book ?web ?offer ?description

WHERE {

?book a dbo:Book .
        ?book dbo:author [author] .
?web md:containsThing ?book .
        ?web md:containsWord "purchase" .
        ?web md:hasMicrodata ?microdata .
        ?microdata schema:offers ?offer .
        ?offer schema:description ?description .

}
ORDER BY ASC(?book)
LIMIT 10

patterns.en_query_pattern: Give me the price and availability of every book whose author is [author]
patterns.hybrid_query_pattern:
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/>
PREFIX md: <http://mekano.org/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?book ?web ?offer ?price ?availability

WHERE {

?book a dbo:Book .
        ?book dbo:author [author] .
?web md:containsThing ?book .
        ?web md:containsWord "purchase" .
        ?web md:hasMicrodata ?microdata .
        ?microdata schema:offers ?offer .
        ?offer schema:price ?price .
  ?offer schema:availability ?availability .

}
ORDER BY ASC(?book)
LIMIT 10

patterns.en_query_pattern: Give me the books available for every book whose author is [author]
patterns.hybrid_query_pattern:
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/>
PREFIX md: <http://mekano.org/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?book ?web ?offer ?bookName

WHERE {

?book a dbo:Book .
        ?book dbo:author [author] .
?web md:containsThing ?book .
        ?web md:containsWord "purchase" .
        ?web md:hasMicrodata ?microdata .
        ?microdata schema:offers ?offer .
        ?offer schema:availability ?availability .
        VALUES ?availability {
 "https://schema.org/Instock" "http://schema.org/InStock" "https://schema.org/InStock" "InStock" 
}
        ?microdata schema:name ?bookName .

}
ORDER BY ASC(?book)
LIMIT 10

patterns.en_query_pattern: Give me the price of the books available for every book whose author is [author]
patterns.hybrid_query_pattern:
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/>
PREFIX md: <http://mekano.org/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?book ?web ?offer ?bookName ?price

WHERE {

?book a dbo:Book .
        ?book dbo:author [author] .
?web md:containsThing ?book .
        ?web md:containsWord "purchase" .
        ?web md:hasMicrodata ?microdata .
        ?microdata schema:offers ?offer .
  ?offer schema:availability ?availability .
        VALUES ?availability {
 "https://schema.org/Instock" "http://schema.org/InStock" "https://schema.org/InStock" "InStock" 
}
        ?offer schema:price ?price .

}
ORDER BY ASC(?book)
LIMIT 10

patterns.en_query_pattern: Give me the price of the book whose title is [book] and whose author is [author]
patterns.hybrid_query_pattern:
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/>
PREFIX md: <http://mekano.org/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?book ?web ?offer ?price

WHERE {

?book a dbo:Book .
        ?book dbo:author [author] .
        ?book foaf:name [book] .
?web md:containsThing ?book .
        ?web md:containsWord "purchase" .
        ?web md:hasMicrodata ?microdata .
        ?microdata schema:offers ?offer .
        ?offer schema:price ?price .

}
ORDER BY ASC(?book)
LIMIT 10

SELECT DISTINCT ?book ?web ?offer ?publisher

        ?book foaf:name [book] .

        ?web md:containsWord "purchase" .
        ?web md:hasMicrodata ?microdata .
        ?microdata schema:offers ?offer .
        ?microdata schema:publisher ?publisher .

}

LIMIT 10

patterns.en_query_pattern: Give me the books available for the book whose title is [book] and whose author is [author]
patterns.hybrid_query_pattern:
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/>
PREFIX md: <http://mekano.org/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?book ?web ?offer ?bookName

WHERE {

?book a dbo:Book .
        ?book dbo:author [author] .
        ?book foaf:name [book] .
?web md:containsThing ?book .
        ?web md:containsWord "purchase" .
        ?web md:hasMicrodata ?microdata .
        ?microdata schema:offers ?offer .
        ?offer schema:availability ?availability .
        VALUES ?availability {
 "https://schema.org/Instock" "http://schema.org/InStock" "https://schema.org/InStock" "InStock" 
}
        ?microdata schema:name ?bookName .

}
ORDER BY ASC(?book)
LIMIT 10

patterns.en_query_pattern: Give me the books available for every book whose author is [author] and published between [year1] and [year2]
patterns.hybrid_query_pattern:
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/>
PREFIX md: <http://mekano.org/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?book ?web ?offer ?bookName

WHERE {

?book a dbo:Book .
        ?book dbo:author [author] .
        ?book dbo:year ?year .
        FILTER(?year >= [year1] && ?year <= [year2]) .
?web md:containsThing ?book .
        ?web md:containsWord "purchase" .
        ?web md:hasMicrodata ?microdata .
        ?microdata schema:offers ?offer .
        ?offer schema:availability ?availability .
        VALUES ?availability {
 "https://schema.org/Instock" "http://schema.org/InStock" "https://schema.org/InStock" "InStock" 
}
        ?microdata schema:name ?bookName .

}
ORDER BY ASC(?book)
LIMIT 10

patterns.en_query_pattern: Give me websites about every book whose author is [author] and whose literary genre is [genre]
patterns.hybrid_query_pattern:
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/>
PREFIX md: <http://mekano.org/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?book ?webAbout

WHERE {

?book a dbo:Book .
        ?book dbo:author [author] .
        ?book dbo:genre [genre] .
?webAbout md:containsThing ?book .
        ?webAbout md:containsWord "purchase" .

}
ORDER BY ASC(?book)
LIMIT 10
